name: iso3166-2
description: Tiny, fast, modular ISO 3166-2 lookup library
author: Michael Scott Hertzberg <mshertzberg@gmail.com> (http://michael.hertzberg.co/)

scripts.build-global: echo 'Building build/iso3166-2.global.js...' && browserify index.js --standalone iso3166 &> build/iso3166-2.global.js
scripts.build-ugly: echo 'Building build/iso3166-2.min.js...' && cat build/iso3166-2.js | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 -c -m &> build/iso3166-2.min.js
scripts.build-ugly-global: echo 'Building build/iso3166-2.global.min.js...' && cat build/iso3166-2.global.js | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 -c -m &> build/iso3166-2.global.min.js
scripts.build: echo 'Building iso3166-2...' && npm run build-basic && npm run build-global && npm run build-ugly && npm run build-ugly-global
